pages.text: 雖然 $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)女巫鍋$() 可以用來製作更不可思議的 $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)釀造$()，但一些女巫有時可能更喜歡使用更微妙的$(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)釀造$().$(br)此條目中的所有 $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)釀造$() 都可以通過其他方式獲得，儘管 $(l: bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)女巫鍋$() 可以讓你使它們更強大。$(br)Mundane $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)釀造$() 在 $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron 中製造)女巫鍋$() 使用的成分略有不同。

pages.title: 吸收
pages.text: Applies temporary extra health.

pages.title: 失明
pages.text: Drastically reduces the target's field of vision, darkening everything around it.

pages.title: 抗火
pages.text: Grants immunity to fire.

pages.title: 發光
pages.text: Makes the target glow obnoxiously.

pages.title: 挖掘加速
pages.text: Increases mining speed and attack speed.

pages.title: 飢餓
pages.text: Applies a hunger effect.

pages.title: 立即治療
pages.text: Instantly heals a flat amount of health, using the healing properties of $(l:bewitchment:introducton/crops)Garlic$().

pages.title: 立即傷害
pages.text: Instantly damages a flat amount of health, harnessing the deadly energies of $(l:bewitchment:introduction/cypress_trees)Cypress$().

pages.title: 隱形
pages.text: 使目標隱形。

pages.title: 跳躍提升
pages.text: Jump boost is self-explanatory.

pages.title: 懸浮
pages.text: Slowly ascends the target into the sky.

pages.title: 挖掘疲勞
pages.text: Mining Fatigue makes the target hit much slower.

pages.title: 噁心
pages.text: Induces sickness by disorienting the target.

pages.title: 夜視
pages.text: Carrots are good for your eyes.

pages.title: 中毒
pages.text: Fills the target's blood with deadly toxin.

pages.title: 回復
pages.text: By utilizing the life energies from $(l:bewitchment:introduction/juniper_trees)Juniper$(), Regeneration quickens the healing process when applied.

pages.title: 抗性
pages.text: 減少受到的傷害。

pages.title: 緩降
pages.text: Makes the target fall gently, like a feather.

pages.title: 緩慢
pages.text: Reduces the target's movement speed.

pages.title: 速度
pages.text: Increases movement speed, using the energizing qualities of Sugar Cane.

pages.title: 力量
pages.text: Using the powers of Oak, this increases damage output.

pages.title: 水下呼吸
pages.text: 允許在水中呼吸。

pages.title: 虛弱
pages.text: Reduces the target's attack damage.$(br2)You may also use a Brown Mushroom for this.

pages.title: 凋零
pages.text: Gradually reduces the target's health.
